diseasesList.body:
Frozen shoulder

Frozen shoulder means your shoulder is painful and stiff for months, sometimes years. It can be treated with shoulder exercises and painkillers.

Rotator Cuff Injury

I am Rotator Cuff Injury Body

Shoulder Bursitis

I am Shoulder Bursitis Body

Shoulder Bursitis

I am Shoulder Bursitis Body

symptoms: Pain when lifting your arm above your head
Pain in the top and outer side of your shoulder
pain or aching at night, which can affect your sleep
Shoulder looks square rather than round
Lump or bulge under the skin in front of your shoulder
Pain when lifting your arm above your head
Pain in the top and outer side of your abd
pain or aching at night, which can affect your sleep
abdomen looks square rather than round
Lump or bulge under the skin in front of your abdomen

Frozen shoulder means your shoulder is painful and stiff for months, sometimes years. It can be treated with shoulder exercises and painkillers.
